cast.overview: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the first martial arts master to teach the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun. The film focuses on events surrounding Ip that took place in the city of Foshan between the 1930s to 1940s during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Directed by Wilson Yip, the film stars Donnie Yen in the lead role, and features fight choreography by Sammo Hung.
cast.title: Ip Man

details.biography: Jin Gang (Chinese: 金剛, formerly known as Li Xinqiao, King Kong) was born in Taiwan on January 19, 1981. Host, actor. He studied in China Maritime College. In 2002, he joined the Taiwanese entertainment industry, performed the third generation of " Spicy Fresh Chef " and served as the host of variety shows. In 2007, he signed a contract with Hong Kong TVB.
details.name: Jin Gang
